unnormalised: Baraabar, tumi atam nim'mchea paisanchem kaarbaar sambhalltai, barabor na? Tem khub borem! Punn banking aani rokddinchea vevharancho sonvsar kednaim kednaim Bollywood-ache kothintlea motthim lagta *hai na*? Tem soglem sopem korun sangchem. Hanv mhoje anubhav aani faaideache upay tumchea vangdda vanttum-ieta.
normalised: bari, atam tunvem tunchea poisheancho tabo ghetlai, sôrai? tem bhov borem! punn banking ani rokh deneva-ghevana sangata cholop bollywoodachea katha-bodlachea bhaxen dista kiteak, hai na? tem apunn khullaun sangim. hanv kaim svota:chi asloleo anubhav ani vapriopachea tipalo vannttum.

unnormalised: Poileam, ATM-anchi baat kortolim. Ami soglem thaim asaam: rokddochim duddu unnim zaataa, lagichem ATM sodhtaa. Mhaka Ugddas asa ek favtt Bengaluru-ant; mhaka mhoje auto-rickshaw *bhai*-ak rokddin duddu divpak zai aslem, aani poilim teen ATM mhaka mell’lim tem vo sevaak naaslem vo bhirantachee raang aslem! Upai: tumchi bank-ache ATM-achem thanne-ache app poileam nhevdun gheiat. Tumcho khub *bakwaas* vell vachaavta! Khass korun tumkaa zai zalyar, sang Rs. 5000 turant.
normalised: poilem, A-T-M-anchi uloup koruya. apunn sogllim thõi asleat: rokh komi poddlea uprant, lagichem A-T-M soddtat. mhaka hea vellar bangalorechi yaad aasa; mhaka mhojea auto-rickshaw bhayak rokh dilo poddtali, ani poile teen A-T-M-ui seva bairi asli vo tankam bhov motteo ranki asli! pro-tip: tunchea bankachem A-T-M locator app sodanch poilim check kora. tumcho bhov bakwaas vell vachoita! khas korun tumkam zai mhonn taka, rupaia panch hozar goroz asta.

unnormalised: Atam, online banking-ache baat koruyaa. Tem soglem badal’ta, barabor na? UPI-n duddu dhaddop jaadu voriim. Punn *sambhallaat*, lokaanu. Hanvem ek favtt Rs. 10000 chukichea monshak dhaadol’lem, kiteak mhaka account-ache nembere somzonaslem. “Dhaadd” buton dabatam mhunn poileam don favtti poriksha ghea! Gambheerpan. Tyaak tumi ek khub uchh molachi chaa piyeuncho voriim socho.
normalised: atam, online banking vishin. tem ekdom game-changer, nhoi? U-P-I-n poishe bhair kaddop jaducha bhaxen. punn samballun ravat, ixttanno. hanvem ek pavtt rupaia dha hozar chukichea monxak patthaun dile kiteak hanv accountachea vostunkaank loksh diunk naslo. tumi "patthaun" button dabuchem poilem sogllea vostunchi duball zoddni kora! gambhirtayen. taka ek motte molachi chai divop mhunn chinta.

unnormalised: Aani mhunn rokddi duddu dhaadolchea machine-anim (CDMs). Upyogi duddu dhaadunk, sang, Rs. 2575 tumchea bank-ache a/c-ant sarki raangant ubhe raavonaastanaa. Punn sadhin ghyaa, kashyeem *gadbad* aslyar.
normalised: ani tenna rokh depoziit mashino (C-D-M-s) assat. depoziit korpak bhov faideak, mhonn taka, rupaia don hozar panchshê ani sattari panch tumchea bank a/c direkt rànkiant ravonastana. sodanch rasid gheiat, kitench gadbad zaunuch nha!

unnormalised: Ek vostu hanvem kathinnaai-n shinkhli ti mhunntyaar tumchea vevharancho tho’v gheunchea. Bankaancho chukaancho sandesh yetolo, aani tumchea thaayim lekha dovornem barem. Mhaje SBI-achem lekha Rs. 200 ek odd dharaavol dakhoi, aani tyaa thikaanak vell laglo.
normalised: ek vost mhaka kotthin ritin shikhlaa ti mhunntlear tunchea deneva-ghevanancher loksh dovorchea khatir. bankank kadchito chukhtaat, ani tem zannem dovorchem boreak. mhojea S-B-I statementan ek vishesh rupaia donshê debit disli, ani ti sôddovn haddak bhov kall laglo.

unnormalised: NEFT aani RTGS visrunk naaka. Tee tumche motthe raasheek upkaar yeta. Mhaka mhaje bhoinichea lognaak Rs. 1.5 lakh dhaddunk zai aslem, aani rokddichim duddu sambhalltanaa tem khub sopem aslem. Aani tumchem PAN card lagin dovraat; tumkaa Rs. 50000-chea voile raatheaak upkaar poddum yeta.
normalised: N-E-F-T ani R-T-G-S visrunk nhozo. te motea ankdeanchea khatir tumche go-to. mhaka mhojea bhoinnechea lognakhatir rupaia ek point panch lakh patthoun dile, ani tem rokh samballun dharcheapek kitlench sope zalem. tasech, tunchem P-A-N card lagim dovorat; tumkam to rupaia pachas hazara voir aslelea ankdeanchea khatir zai poddtta.

unnormalised: Anik ek upai: bank-ache sukhe chukonaaka! Tumhi duddan vireth aschea naaka sodhuk jevhnaaram vo bandh asli, khass Diwali porbo vorim. Tumhi atm-achem dharmantham 7:00 PM vorim sankaalin avoid kortolyat.
normalised: ani ek tip: bankachea sukhentlea disacher loksh dovorat! tumkam rokh nastana koidi poddona mhunn zannem dovorat jevhna sogllem bond asta, khas korun diwali sarkhea utsavak. tumi saat zero zero P-M-ak ek rat poilem asleli A-T-M-chi dhak dhuk vochun dileli mhunn upkari astaat.

unnormalised: Nimannem, netbanking-ache saathee sompurn zanvaat! HDFC vo ICICI voriim almost her bank aplam app devum yeta. Hanv tenka 10 varsha vorim jodhlo aani kadin visrun gelom. Tumchea fundancho kaarbaar sarko sopem zalo.
normalised: nimannem, netbanking sangata sovem zaat! H-D-F-C vo I-C-I-C-I bhaxen lagbag soglleo bank app ditaat. hanv dha vorsam poilim tenchek add joddlo gele ani magir parkunk na. tumchea donddank niyantrik korop sopem zalem.
